src/parallel/ll-src/hydrodynamics.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Calculate the velocity, pressure, and chemical potential based on the order parameter (fbar) and pressure (gbar) distribution functions after the streaming step assuming periodic boundary conditions in all directions for the parallel D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM.
